name: County Offices Will Close for Martin Luther King Jr. Holiday
description: County offices, family resource centers, libraries and animal shelters will be closed to the public Monday, Jan. 16 for Martin Luther King Jr. Day.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
County offices, family resource centers, libraries and animal shelters will be closed to the public Monday, Jan. 16 for Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
County-operated COVID-19 vaccination and testing sites will be closed Jan. 16 and will resume normal hours Tuesday, Jan. 17. Some of the County’s partner and contract sites will be open. Check the County’s coronavirus-sd.com website to schedule an appointment.
Sheriff’s Department patrols and animal control emergency response, and all essential services will continue during the holiday.
County parks, preserves and campgrounds will be open during normal business hours.
Facilities at several County Parks will be closed.

The Valley Center Community Hall will be closed.
The Fallbrook Community Center will be closed.
The Lakeside Community Center will be closed.
The Lakeside Teen Center/REC Club will be closed.
The Spring Valley Community Center will be closed.
The Spring Valley Teen Center will be closed.
The Spring Valley Gym will be closed.
The 4S Ranch Recreation Office will be closed.

County offices will resume normal hours on Tuesday, Jan. 17.
